dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text:
Welcome, Heir, to the Eternal Sanctuary.

The land is scarred, but it is not beyond repair.

The heroes who gather here are not mere warriorsâ€”they are beacons of hope.

And you, my child, are their guiding light.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text:
But the darkness does not sleep.

Beneath the earth, in the forgotten depths, it stirs.

The first expedition awaits.

Will your heroes emerge victorious, or will they fall and rise again, tempered by the loop?
